title: A simpler sidebar
description: We redesigned the RuleLab navigation to hide apps you don’t use that often. Customize your favorite apps via the 'All Apps' menu, and make it your own.

title: The inbox becomes Messages
description: Messages is a full app for collaborating on documents. If you’re dealing with lots of messages, you’ll love it.

title: Create, leveled up
description: We're introducing a new Create menu, and we're expanding it with everything you'll need to create on RuleLab.

title: RuleLab University
description: Keep up-to-date with all of the latest changes, and learn from a large library of training videos taught by experts.
